items.title: Samsung’s 2025 37-inch Odyssey G7 165Hz 4K UHD curved gaming monitor hits new all-time low at $300 off
items.summary:
As part of its ongoing early Holiday sale, Samsung is offering its latest 37-inch Odyssey G7 165Hz 4K gaming monitor down to $599.99 shipped. This particular display debuted a few months ago carrying a $900 price tag, and it’s now seeing a $300 discount. It saw its first big discount when it dropped to $700 during the recent fall Prime Day sale, shortly after which it hit the $650 mark. Today’s deal – which is matched at Amazon – shaves an additional $50 off its previous all-time low and our mention from last month to mark a new best price to beat. This is the lowest price we have tracked for this model, and you’ll also find the 40-inch variant of this display at $750 low right now. Head below for more details.

more…

items.summary: Arturia's KeyStep is one of the most popular MIDI controllers ever made, especially with modular synth users and the DAWless crowd. It's small, cheap, has an easy-to-use sequencer, and offers decent connectivity. But it was also released way back in January of 2016. The world of music gear moves more slowly than, say, smartphones, but […]

With the first week of November coming to a close, we have a large collection of early Black Friday sales, particularly on e-bikes and power stations. Leading the e-bikes is Lectric’s Black Friday event with up to $893 savings on e-bike bundles starting from $999, with a side sale providing up to 25% discounts on 16 different extra batteries starting from $270. There’s plenty more to get excited about from Rad Power, Velotric, Heybike, as well as power station sales from EcoFlow, Anker SOLIX, Jackery – not to mention the MANY exclusive new low prices we’ve secured, and more. Head below to see the best of what we’ve spotted this week.
